column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Yummm!! When you're ordering so many dishes as you do when at a tapas bar - you would think at least statistically 25% of the dishes mightn't meet your expectations. I must say Ba-Ba-Reeba just got everything as perfect as possible. All of their dips and sauces are just amazing and flavorful. We ordered stuffed mushrooms
column3: shrimp in garlic sauce and many more. Everything was delightful! Don't miss the Sangria here!!
